description: The Causality actor—also referred to as the causality group owner (CGO)—is the parent process in the execution chain that the Cortex XDR/XSIAM agent identified as being responsible for initiating the process tree.

fields.name: causality_actor_causality_id
fields.description: Causality ID of the causality actor.

fields.name: causality_actor_effective_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: causality_actor_effective_username
fields.description: Source effective username.

fields.name: causality_actor_primary_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: causality_actor_primary_username
fields.description: Name assigned to the user_sid.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_auth_id
fields.description: Windows: LUID (uint64) representing the token of the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_causality_id
fields.description: Causality ID of the causality actor process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_command_line
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_command_line_indices
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) from which this process started. including name, class guid, class name, bus type, volume guid, mount point, file system, drive type, vendor id, product id, and serial number.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_execution_time
fields.description: Causality actor process execution time in epoch time.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_file_access_time
fields.description: Access time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_file_create_time
fields.description: Creation time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_file_mod_time
fields.description: Modification time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_file_size
fields.description: Size of the file involved in the process in bytes.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_image_extension
fields.description: Process image extension - File extension.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_image_md5
fields.description: MD5 of the binary.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_image_name
fields.description: File name of the 'causality_actor_process_image_path'.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_image_path
fields.description: Process image path - A string identifying the location of the execution.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_image_sha256
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_instance_id
fields.description: Cortex XDR/XSIAM unique identifier for the causality actor process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_integrity_level
fields.description: Process integrity level.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_is_64bit
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the process is 64-bit.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_is_native
fields.description: Indicates whether this process is a 'native process'. On a 32-bit machine the value is always true; on a 64-bit machine, it is true, if the process is a 64-bit process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_is_replay
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the Agent was alive during the execution of the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_is_special
fields.description: Indicates special system processes: RegularProcess = 0, KernelProcess = 1, AppContainerProcess = 2, NonWin32SubsystemProcess = 3

fields.name: causality_actor_process_logon_id
fields.description: Windows: LUID (uint64) representing the token of the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_os_pid
fields.description: The Operating System (OS) Process Identifier (PID) of the causality actor process

fields.name: causality_actor_process_session_id
fields.description: Windows: Session ID of the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_signature_is_embedded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the signature is embedded inside the Program Executable (PE) or part of an external catalog file.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_signature_product
fields.description: Signature product - The product family part of the signature.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_signature_status
fields.description: Signature status of the process: Signed = 1, SignedInvalid = 2, Unsigned = 3, FailedToObtain = 4, WeakHash = 5, Unsupported = 6, InvalidCVE2020_0601 = 7, Deleted = 8

fields.name: causality_actor_process_signature_vendor
fields.description: Signature vendor - The vendor part of the signature.

fields.name: causality_actor_remote_host
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor and the host was resolved successfully.

fields.name: causality_actor_remote_ip
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is not local and the IP was resolved successfully.

fields.name: causality_actor_remote_pipe_name
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcNamedPipe.

fields.name: causality_actor_remote_port
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcTcp.

fields.name: causality_actor_type
fields.description: Local = 1, RemoteRpcNamedPipe = 2, RemoteRpcHttp = 3, RemoteRpcTcp = 4, RemoteFileSmb = 5

fields.name: causality_actor_primary_normalized_user
fields.description: Normalized user information.

fields.name: causality_actor_container_info
fields.description: The container information for the process.

fields.name: causality_actor_rpc_interface_uuid
fields.description: MS-RPC interface unique identifier.

fields.name: causality_actor_rpc_func_opnum
fields.description: MS-RPC function operation identitifer.

fields.name: causality_actor_rpc_interface_version_major
fields.description: MS-RPC interface major version.

fields.name: causality_actor_rpc_interface_version_minor
fields.description: MS-RPC interface minor version.

fields.name: causality_actor_rpc_protocol
fields.description: MS-RPC protocol type.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_last_writer_actor
fields.description: Cortex instance ID of the last process that has written the causality actor process image.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_image_auth_sha1
fields.description: Process image SHA-2 authenticode.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_image_auth_sha2
fields.description: Process image SHA-1 authenticode.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_file_original_name
fields.description: Original file name of the casuality actor image based on the file information metadata.

fields.name: causality_actor_process_file_internal_name
fields.description: Internal name of the casuality actor image based on the file information metadata.
